column4: just installed gutsy,anyone know why sound dont work and also cant set special effects to anything except basic?
what kind of video card and sound card do you have?

well, if it's a new computer like 'just bought it' the easiest way might be to look on the box or in the manual, otherwise you can use lsmod to see what kernel modules you have loaded and work backwards from there
can you run lspci and pastebin that as well
